name: SpeakRepeat
0:
”Alexa, Speak repeat”
”speak repeat hush little baby”
”speak like harrison ford”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: speak repeat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Speak Repeat skill plays 3-6 second clips of popular children's songs, traditional songs, speeches of great people in history, renditions of poems & movie dialogs. Repeat and imitate the speaker's voice just like in the clip. The more you do it, the more fun it is. 

Alexa, speak repeat 

Welcome to speak repeat ...

Speak repeat Twinkle Twinkle little star

This will start playing 3 to 6 second clips of song twinkle twinkle little star. Just repeat after the speaker and after that alexa will play next clip, repeat that and continue the whole song.

Some others

speak repeat JFK

speak repeat the bells

speak repeat Yankee Doodle dandy

Our full catalog is here https://speakrepeat.com/catalog/

We are constantly adding new content. Check back later.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
